item.description:
This is the Tanks! Special Edition of Critical Hit magazine.

Included are the following articles:

Desert Tactics by Robert Modarelli
Soldiers of Lagus by Tommi Syrjanen
Jatkosota: Design Notes by Ray Tapio
Tigers in Tunisia by Rory Millard

Included are the following scenarios:

CH63 March of the Mastodons - German infantry heavily reinforced by assault guns and tank destroyers must stop General Patton’s attempt to relieve Bastogne during the Battle of the Bulge (1944).

CH64 Race for the Bridges - A German infantry company defends a key village with armored support as the Americans attempt to seize a bridge over the Rhine (1945).

CH65 The Seton Block - Battalion strength Japanese infantry attempt to bypass a Chinese roadblock during their retreat from northern Burma (1944).

CH66 One for the Trophy Case - With the drive on Tunis (1943) stopped German armor tests the resolve of the British by unleashing the Tiger tank.

CH 67 New Kid on the Block - The British armored spearhead driving toward Tunis (1942) runs into a new German weapon, the Tiger tank.

CH68 Special Messenger - German armored forces must clear a desert track of American infantry that have hastily occupied this position during the German counterattack from Tunis (1943).

CH69 Baptism of Fire - American infantry with British armor support assault dug in Germans on the Siegfried line (1944).

CH70 Surprise at Honkaniemi - A Finnish armored counterattack catches Russian tankers taking a break in this late Winter War (1940) action.

CH71 Bottom of the Barrel - Russian infantry and armor assault dug in Germans during the final hours of the Third Reich (1945).

CH72 Across the Wurm - American infantry supported by British armor attempt to crack the Siegfried line (1944) against dug in German infantry with Panther support.

Jatkosota 2 (ver 2) At the Gates of Viipuri - A Soviet infantry company reinforced by heavy tanks attempts to crack Finnish defenses during the Soviet attempt to knock Finland out of the war (1944).

ABS1 Ivan’s Roadblock - German infantry and armor must eliminate a Russian roadblock during the early blitzkrieg into Russia (1941).

ABS2 The Chantilly Prelude - A German infantry platoon faces a weakened American infantry platoon for control of a village during the assault on the Siegfried Line (1944), but reinforcements are on the way.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
